name: Sloppy Slopes
description:
It's skiing time! 

Ski down these sloppy slopes as you make your way from tavern to tavern! 

Throw your gifts at the baby animals as you share your Christmas Joy! Also, try not to ski into things! (This advice applies both to the game and real life!) Collisions will cause you to spill some hot cocoa. Start your journey by exiting the tavern door.

 = Controls = 

 A / D to Steer 

 WASD to Walk 

 MOUSE to Aim 

 LEFT CLICK to Throw Presents 

 SPACE to Jump / Do a 360 (in Air)

= Made by Jack, Jared, Tyler for Wintermelon =
